member.summary: Handler for retrieving file classifications

member.summary: Handles the request to get all file classifications

member.name: T:AStar.Dev.Files.Classifications.Api.FileClassification
member.summary: Represents a classification of files, providing metadata about the type of files and associated entities such as file details and file name parts.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Files.Classifications.Api.FileClassification.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the file classification. This property serves as the primary key for the entity.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Files.Classifications.Api.FileClassification.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the file classification. This property represents the descriptive label for a specific classification and is often used to identify or categorize files within the database.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Files.Classifications.Api.FileClassification.Celebrity
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the file classification is considered a "Celebrity." This property is used to mark specific classifications with special significance.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Files.Classifications.Api.FileClassification.IncludeInSearch
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this classification should be included in search results. This property determines if files associated with this classification are considered searchable.

member.name: M:AStar.Dev.Files.Classifications.Api.ServiceBuilderExtensions.AddFileClassificationsApiServices(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.WebApplicationBuilder)
member.summary: Adds the file classifications API services to the specified service collection.
member.remarks: This method registers the with a scoped lifetime. Call this method during application startup to enable file classification features via dependency injection.
member.param: The service collection to which the file classifications API services will be added.
The web application builder used to configure the application.
member.returns: The same instance of that was provided, to support method chaining.
